name: Miner_Royale_Presentation_FINAL.zip
description:
for our final game project we created a game where you play as a virtaul character in a post apocolytpic world that has mmo elements. Insipiration was breath of the wild meets pubg and is to demonstrate human greed and racism. thank you dr. yong and fellow studnets for a wonderful semester and sorry our group missed presentation day here is our presentation

sincerI have something I'd like to show you.

Something you'll be very interested in.

We have a lot in common, after all.

eley, jon

PS tanner made the slideshow in linux because he doesnt believe in propietary software so we encluded a install for it

PSS game newel told us we legaly had to charge money for this acording to US patent law but it is olny half a hour long so pls do not downvote us 😊
